improvements.title: Monaco editors can now retrieve schemas from Mia CDN
description: In Mia-Platform Console, Monaco editors can now retrieve schemas from Mia CDN, improving the user experience for code autocomplete, schema-based validation, and linting.

bugFixes: Resolved an issue in the Companyâ€™s Provider section that prevented establishing a connection to Azure DevOps when the `Git Provider` capability and `Client Credentials` authentication method settings were selected.
We fixed a bug that prevented the selected Mia-Assistant model from being retained when pinning the chat.
We fixed an issue that prevented clipboard copy/paste actions from working in iframe extensions.

improvements.title: Import Stream Processor schema in service configuration
description: In the Design Area, when configuring the `config.json` file of the Stream Processor, now it is possible to import the [Stream Processor schema](https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/runtime/platform/data-fabric/stream-processor/v0.5.4/stream-processor.schema.json) from Mia CDN, to enable code autocompletion, schema-based validation, and linting in Monaco editors.
